General.Name: Beijing Caishikou Department Store Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Caishikou Department Store Co.,Ltd. operates a retailer of gold jewelry in China. It primarily deals in gold and silver jewelry, arts and crafts, recycled gold, gold jewelry, platinum, diamonds, emerald jade K, diamond jewelry, and precious metal investment and cultural products. The company sells its products through directly operated chain stores, as well as online sales platforms. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 306, Guang'anmen Nei Street, Beijing, China, 100053

2.Name: Ms. Huaping  Xie
